name: Middle Ages Hero
description:
Middle Ages Hero, a game with simple and entertaining but effective graphics is made for the fun of those who play it. Playing you will find yourself in an epic / medieval environment that will remind many classic videogames. We could classify it in the genre of adventures and platforms, since the gameplay is 2D. Even so, the difficulty is moderate, because it is a game made for any type of player. It will be entertaining and fun to the most experienced players and a bit challenging without being exhaustive for the less experienced.

In your adventure you will find different enemies, platform levels and many more surprises that you will only discover playing it!

The game has an introduction in the form of a tutorial that will explain the mechanics and gameplay of it, as well as its complete controls.

Some features:

-Classic side-scrolling action, with all the modern trimmings.

-Tightly tuned 2D controls. Dodge, dash and slash your way through even the most deadly adversaries.

-Beautiful painted landscapes.

-Unique gameplay and addictive sounds.

-Nice sound and graphics .

-Shop system, using crystals and gold to buy items .

-Addictive gameplay.
